HI

I Bought KSP On my computer and now ive bought a new computer

And i dont want to buy it one more time

Please help me!

Welcome aboard!

If you bought the game through the KSP store you can simply redownload and install as per normal. If you bought through Steam you can install Steam on your new PC and install through there. No further purchase necessary.
This also goes for all of the other games you may have on your computer

Imagine if we had to buy the games again...

Dark times are coming....

You joke but pre-Steam that was how downloadable games were. There weren't many of them in the first place as it was such a new idea, but you were responsible for backing up your download after you downloaded it, the link only worked once.

That's certainly been the case for all the non-steam games I've downloaded
The codes were generally good for one download only. After that, better have backups.
